title: Crystal orb

properties.name: description
properties.value: The crystal orb is an item used in The Gauntlet. It is obtained as a drop from a Crystalline Dragon miniboss. It can be used with the attuned crystal staff to create a perfected crystal staff.Players may use a pestle and mortar to crush the spike into 80 crystal shards. The next kill of the Crystalline Dragon will still provide the 50/50 chance of the crystalline bowstring and crystal spike.

Advanced data
Item ID23870

The crystal orb is an item used in The Gauntlet. It is obtained as a drop from a Crystalline Dragon miniboss. It can be used with the attuned crystal staff to create a perfected crystal staff.Players may use a pestle and mortar to crush the spike into 80 crystal shards. The next kill of the Crystalline Dragon will still provide the 50/50 chance of the crystalline bowstring and crystal spike.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

[[File:Crystal orb detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''crystal orb''' is an item used in [[The Gauntlet]]. It is obtained as a drop from a [[Crystalline Dragon]] miniboss. It can be used with the [[Crystal staff (attuned)|attuned crystal staff]] to create a [[Crystal staff (perfected)|perfected crystal staff]].Players may use a [[pestle and mortar]] to crush the spike into 80 [[crystal shards]]. The next kill of the [[Crystalline Dragon]] will still provide the 50/50 chance of the [[crystalline bowstring]] and [[crystal spike]].
